About the Company: Sandur Manganese & Iron Ores Ltd. (SMIORE) is engaged in mining of finest low grade, low phosphorous, manganese and iron ores, facility for production of ferroalloys and management of hydro-electric power generation.Recently, the Company has undertaken production of solar photo-voltaic modules for various applications..The company also in the business segment of Mining, Ferroalloy & Power.
